oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Crystal growth and electrical properties of Li2B4O7
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BYRAPPA, K
RAJEEV, V
HANUMESH, VJ
KULKARNI, AR
KULKARNI, AB
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: lithium tetraborate
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Growth of Li2B4O7 crystals has been carried out under hydrothermal conditions at relatively low temperature and pressure conditions (T = 250 degrees C, P = 100 bars). A systematic study of electrical measurements has been carried out within a wide range of internal frequency and temperature. The corresponding impedance, Arrhenius, and Bode plots are given.
